languages.text: {n}Улыбка Джай становится еще ослепительнее.{/n} "Надеюсь, эта поверхностная и совершенно неуместная характеристика из уст многоуважаемого арбитра не помешает вам само{mf|му|й} составить мнение о моих многочисленных и блестящих талантах!"

{n}Jae's smile grows even more dazzling.{/n} "I do hope this cursory and altogether inappropriate character assessment from the distinguished Arbitrator will not hinder you from forming your own opinion of my many illustrious talents!"
languages.original_text: {n}Улыбка Джай становится еще ослепительнее.{/n} "Надеюсь, эта поверхностная и совершенно неуместная характеристика из уст многоуважаемого арбитра не помешает вам само{mf|му|й} составить мнение о моих многочисленных и блестящих талантах!"

{n}Jae's smile grows even more dazzling.{/n} "I do hope this cursory and altogether inappropriate character assessment from the distinguished Arbitrator will not hinder you from forming your own opinion of my many illustrious talents!"

languages.text: {n}婕伊的笑容变得更加甜蜜。{/n}“这位尊敬的法务官对我的看法过于草率，总体评价也不太合适。不过即便如此，我也依然希望你能意识到我与众不同的才华！”
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's smile grows even more dazzling.{/n} "I do hope this cursory and altogether inappropriate character assessment from the distinguished Arbitrator will not hinder you from forming your own opinion of my many illustrious talents!"

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊的笑容变得更加甜蜜。{/n}“这位尊敬的法务官对我的看法过于草率，总体评价也不太合适。不过即便如此，我也依然希望你能意识到我与众不同的才华！”

languages.text: {n}La sonrisa de Jae se vuelve aún más radiante.{/n} «¡Espero que este análisis superficial y totalmente inapropiado de mi persona por parte del distinguido Arbitrator no le impida formar su propia opinión de mis muchos talentos ilustres!».
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's smile grows even more dazzling.{/n} "I do hope this cursory and altogether inappropriate character assessment from the distinguished Arbitrator will not hinder you from forming your own opinion of my many illustrious talents!"

traits.locale_text: {n}La sonrisa de Jae se vuelve aún más radiante.{/n} «¡Espero que este análisis superficial y totalmente inapropiado de mi persona por parte del distinguido Arbitrator no le impida formar su propia opinión de mis muchos talentos ilustres!».

languages.text: {n}Jae affiche un sourire encore plus éblouissant.{/n} « J'espère que l'évaluation sommaire et quelque peu insultante de ma personne que vient de vous offrir cet honorable arbitrator ne vous empêchera pas de vous former votre propre opinion sur mes nombreux talents ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's smile grows even more dazzling.{/n} "I do hope this cursory and altogether inappropriate character assessment from the distinguished Arbitrator will not hinder you from forming your own opinion of my many illustrious talents!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae affiche un sourire encore plus éblouissant.{/n} « J'espère que l'évaluation sommaire et quelque peu insultante de ma personne que vient de vous offrir cet honorable arbitrator ne vous empêchera pas de vous former votre propre opinion sur mes nombreux talents ! »

languages.text: {n}ジェイの笑みはさらにまばゆくなった。{/n}「尊敬すべきアービトレイターによるこの手短でまったく不適切な人物評価が、アタシの数々の輝かしい才能に対するアンタ自身の見解を持つ妨げにならないことを願ってるわ！」
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's smile grows even more dazzling.{/n} "I do hope this cursory and altogether inappropriate character assessment from the distinguished Arbitrator will not hinder you from forming your own opinion of my many illustrious talents!"

traits.locale_text: {n}ジェイの笑みはさらにまばゆくなった。{/n}「尊敬すべきアービトレイターによるこの手短でまったく不適切な人物評価が、アタシの数々の輝かしい才能に対するアンタ自身の見解を持つ妨げにならないことを願ってるわ！」

languages.text: {n}Jae'ın gülüşü daha da baş döndürücü bir hâl alıyor.{/n} "Umarım saygın Yargıcı'nın yaptığı bu üstünkörü ve tamamıyla uygunsuz karakter değerlendirmesi, sizi sayısız şanlı becerim konusunda kendi fikirlerinizi ortaya koymaktan geri bırakmaz!"
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's smile grows even more dazzling.{/n} "I do hope this cursory and altogether inappropriate character assessment from the distinguished Arbitrator will not hinder you from forming your own opinion of my many illustrious talents!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae'ın gülüşü daha da baş döndürücü bir hâl alıyor.{/n} "Umarım saygın Yargıcı'nın yaptığı bu üstünkörü ve tamamıyla uygunsuz karakter değerlendirmesi, sizi sayısız şanlı becerim konusunda kendi fikirlerinizi ortaya koymaktan geri bırakmaz!"

languages.text: {n}Jaes Lächeln wird noch strahlender.{/n} "Ich hoffe, diese oberflächliche und gänzlich unangemessene Charakterbeurteilung des geschätzten Arbitrators hindert Euch nicht daran, Euch eine eigene Meinung über meine vielfältigen Talente zu bilden!"
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's smile grows even more dazzling.{/n} "I do hope this cursory and altogether inappropriate character assessment from the distinguished Arbitrator will not hinder you from forming your own opinion of my many illustrious talents!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Jaes Lächeln wird noch strahlender.{/n} "Ich hoffe, diese oberflächliche und gänzlich unangemessene Charakterbeurteilung des geschätzten Arbitrators hindert Euch nicht daran, Euch eine eigene Meinung über meine vielfältigen Talente zu bilden!"
